function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Declines in conservation revenue and capacity, livelihood and trade disruptions","Impact":"Long-lasting negative implications for biodiversity and conservation efforts","Mitigation":"Diversification of funding sources, adaptation of livelihood strategies, and development of resilient trade systems","Technologies":"Remote sensing for monitoring biodiversity, online platforms for trade, and digital payment systems for funding","People":"Conservation organizations, local communities, and wildlife trade stakeholders","Owner":"Conservation organizations, local governments, and international trade regulators"},{"Description":"Vulnerabilities in social and economic models supporting conservation efforts","Impact":"Risk of continued susceptibility to future perturbations","Mitigation":"Reevaluation of economic models, promotion of sustainable livelihoods, and integration of community-based conservation practices","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparent funding mechanisms, sustainable agriculture practices, and community-based monitoring systems","People":"Conservation organizations, local communities, and policymakers","Owner":"Conservation organizations, local governments, and international funding bodies"}]}
